mapper.select: select lesson.*, classtype.typeName, subject.subjectName, stu.stuName, stu.school, grade.gradeName from remindpay, lesson, classtype, subject, grade, stu where remindpay.lessonID = lesson.lessonID AND lesson.stuID = stu.stuID AND lesson.typeID = classtype.typeID AND lesson.subjectID = subject.subjectID AND stu.gradeID = grade.gradeID limit #{toPageNo}, #{pageSize}
select stu.*, grade.gradeName from stu, grade, remindpay,lesson WHERE remindpay.lessonID = lesson.lessonID AND lesson.stuID = stu.stuID AND stu.gradeID = grade.gradeID
